meanings.definition: Decorative plasterwork on walls or ceilings.
meanings.sent1: The stuccowork on the ceiling added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The old mansion was adorned with intricate stuccowork throughout.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the stuccowork on the wall, leaving tiny paw prints behind.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like stuccowork, carefully crafted and beautiful to behold.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the stuccowork, creating mesmerizing patterns on the walls.

meanings.definition: The act or process of applying stucco to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The stuccowork of the artisans transformed the plain walls into works of art.
meanings.sent2: After hours of stuccowork, the building's exterior looked brand new.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they watched the clumsy painter attempt stuccowork on the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft was evident in every stroke of stuccowork he applied.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of stuccowork being done echoed through the empty halls.
